message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth more than that to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm happy to work with you.  I can come down to $9500.  It's a fair price that still allows me to make a profit. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9250. That's the lowest I can go, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
